abstract: Brandon Baldwin and Olajuwon Davis of St Louis plead guilty in federal court to charges that they had planned bomb attack on Ferguson, Mo, police officials in retaliation for shooting death of Michael Brown.
lead_paragraph: Two St. Louis men pleaded guilty Tuesday to federal charges that they planned a bomb attack on the police chief of Ferguson and other officials after the killing there last summer of a black teenager by a white police officer.

headline.main: Missouri: Men Plead Guilty to Plotting to Bomb Ferguson Officials
headline.print_headline: Missouri: Men Plead Guilty to Plotting to Bomb Ferguson Officials

snippet: Two St. Louis men pleaded guilty Tuesday to federal charges that they planned a bomb attack on the police chief of Ferguson and other officials after the killing there last summer of a black teenager by a white police officer.
